Interface SimulationControl

      • performStepSequence

        java.util.List<JsonSimulationStep> performStepSequence(int numberOfSteps,
                                                       int visualizationMultiplier)
                                                throws TraciException,
                                                       InfrastructureElementNotFoundException
        Does required number of steps in the simulation
        Parameters:
        numberOfSteps - number of steps to do
        visualizationMultiplier - how to multiply vehicle dimensions for web
        Returns:
        json object of data for visualization
        Throws:
        TraciException - when the traci call fails
        InfrastructureElementNotFoundException - when some of required infrastracure is missing
